developer: NATIONAL PATH LAB AND RESEARCH CENTER
description:
National Path Lab is a distinguished and privately owned clinical laboratory, renowned for its independence and excellence in diagnostic services. Since our inception in 2013 in the bustling city of Butwal, Rupandehi, Nepal, we have swiftly expanded our operations to other regions across Nepal, establishing ourselves as a leader in the field of pathology and laboratory medicine.

From the outset, our mission has been clear: to provide high-quality and advanced diagnostic services that prioritize patient care above all else. This commitment to excellence is reflected in our Category "A" accreditation, a prestigious recognition we have proudly held since 2013. Our state-of-the-art laboratory facilities and collection centers are equipped with the latest technology and staffed by highly trained professionals dedicated to delivering accurate and timely diagnostic results.
Our Services
At National Path Lab, we offer an extensive range of diagnostic services designed to meet the diverse needs of our patients. Our offerings include preventive health check-up packages and specialized tests in areas such as immunology, oncology, neurology, gynecology, and nephrology. We continuously strive to expand our service range to stay at the forefront of medical advancements and ensure that our patients receive the best possible care.

Flow Cytometry
Flow cytometry is one of our key services, providing versatile applications in biomedical research, diagnostics, and drug development. This technology aids in immunophenotyping, cell cycle analysis, and drug screening, enabling detailed examination and characterization of cells. By analyzing the physical and chemical characteristics of cells or particles as they flow in a fluid stream through a beam of light, flow cytometry provides rapid, accurate, and multi-parametric data. This technology is particularly useful in the diagnosis and monitoring of diseases such as leukemia, lymphoma, and HIV/AIDS.

Flow cytometry's ability to analyze thousands of particles per second and simultaneously measure multiple parameters makes it an invaluable tool in both clinical and research settings. The applications of flow cytometry extend beyond immunophenotyping to include cell sorting, which allows for the isolation of specific cell populations for further analysis. This capability is critical for advancing personalized medicine, where tailored treatments are developed based on the specific characteristics of a patient's cells.

Therapeutic Drug Monitoring (TDM)
Therapeutic Drug Monitoring ensures safe and effective medication dosing by measuring drug concentrations in patients' blood. This service guides personalized treatment, optimizing therapeutic outcomes and minimizing adverse effects. TDM is particularly crucial for medications with narrow therapeutic indices, where the range between therapeutic and toxic doses is small. By regularly monitoring drug levels, healthcare providers can adjust dosages to achieve the desired therapeutic effect while avoiding toxicity.

MDCalc is the leading clinical decision support app providing 900+ evidence-based calculators, risk scores, and clinical tools to support patient care at the bedside. MDCalc has been trusted by millions of clinicians since 2005.

Why Clinicians Choose MDCalc:

• Created by Physicians, for Physicians - All tools developed and validated by board-certified physicians  
• 900+ Clinical Tools - Risk scores, algorithms, dosing calculators, and more with consistent updates and new tools added regularly 
• Works Offline - Full functionality without internet connection  
• Evidence-Based - Every tool includes research validation and expert commentary  
• CME Tracking - Earn CME just by reading through the clinical content surrounding many of our tools
• Free Registration - Complete access in under 30 seconds  

Key Features:

Smart Search & Organization
• Quick search across all tools
• Customizable favorites and specialty lists
• Recently used tools for quick access
• Auto-sync between web and mobile
• Explore page for personalized suggestions

Clinical Expertise
• Expert insights from creators
• Pearls & pitfalls from specialists
• Evidence summaries with PubMed links
• Error warnings and normal value ranges

Workflow Support
• Toggle between US and SI units instantly
• Works in limited connectivity settings
• Easy to use at the point-of-care

Popular Tools Include:
• Creatinine Clearance - Cockcroft-Gault Equation
• HA2DS2-VASc Score - Atrial Fibrillation Stroke Risk
• HEART Score- Major Cardiac Events
• Wells' Criteria - Pulmonary Embolism & DVT
• MELD Score - End-Stage Liver Disease
• HAS-BLED Score - Major Bleeding Risk
• SIRS/Sepsis Criteria - Septic Shock Assessment
• Mean Arterial Pressure - Hemodynamic Monitoring


MDCalc ensures only the highest-quality, clinically relevant tools make it into the app. Each calculator undergoes rigorous evidence appraisal and validation by our network of academic and practicing physician experts.

더 건강한 국민의 삶을 위해 모바일로 편리하게 민원서비스를 이용하세요.

1. 민원여기요
- 자격득실확인서, 보험료 납부확인서 등 증명서 5종을 제출기관에 팩스로 보낼 수 있습니다.
- 보험료 조회·납부, 환급금 조회·신청,  진료받은 내용 보기 등의 서비스를 이용하실 수 있습니다.

2. 건강모아
- 나와 가족(영유아)의 건강검진, 진료 및 투약내역 등의 정보를 확인할 수 있습니다.
- 건강검진 결과를 기반으로 건강나이 및 질병발생 위험을 예측할 수 있습니다.
- 혈압, 혈당 등을 직접 기록하거나 기기연동으로 꾸준히 건강을 관리할 수 있습니다.

3. 장기요양보험
- 장기요양 인정신청, 등급판정결과, 재가급여 서비스 이용 내역 확인 등 다양한 장기요양 민원서비스를 이용할 수 있습니다.

4. 고객센터
- 문의, 불편사항을 해결할 수 있도록 상담 글 등록, 채팅상담, 청각·언어 장애인을 위한 수어 상담 서비스를 이용할 수 있습니다.
- 국민 중심의 공단을 만들어가기 위하여 국민제안, 국민토론방을 운영하고 있습니다.
- 국민건강보험의 효율적인 예산 운용 및 절감을 위한 신고/제안 및 부당 청구한 요양기관·장기요양기관을 신고할 수 있습니다.

5. 기타
- 공동, 금융, 민간, 건강보험 인증서 등 8종의 다양한 로그인 방식으로 이용할 수 있습니다.
- 제증명서 발급화면으로 바로갈 수 있는 퀵액션 기능을 이용할 수 있습니다.
앱 접근 권한 안내
[선택]
미 동의 시에도 The건강보험 앱 서비스를 이용할 수 있으나 일부서비스의 이용이 제한될 수 있습니다.
- 저장공간: 사진, 미디어, 파일 접근 권한으로 인증서를 보관하고 보안강화를 위한 OS변조 여부 체크에 사용합니다.
- 위치: 병의원 찾기, 지사 찾기 등 주변 정보 검색 시 사용합니다.
- 마이크: 수어상담 연결, 음성검색을 위해 사용합니다.
- 카메라: 수어상담 연결을 위해 사용합니다.
- 블루투스: 혈압, 혈당, 걸음 수 데이터를 등록하기 위해 사용합니다.
- 생체인식: 간편 로그인을 위해 사용합니다.
- 모션인식: 걸음 수 데이터 측정을 위해 사용합니다.

Perfect for learning anatomy and enhancing health literacy, people around the world are using the BioDigital Human to learn and educate on anatomy, physiology, treatments, and health conditions such as cancer, heart disease, injuries and more. The BioDigital Human online application, included in your registration and available at human.biodigital.com, empowers you to create your own custom 3D models to visualize anatomy and the inner workings of the human body.

Trusted by 3,000,000+ students from nearly 5,000 institutions, the BioDigital Human is used globally by leading medical schools, health systems, medical device, pharmaceutical and education companies including J&J, NYU Medical, Apple and Google.
 
Proven to increase learning retention by 43% as compared to students learning with traditional resources, and to improve assessment by 16% as compared to learning by cadaveric prosection.

Title: DIMS

Short description: 
DIMS is the Best offline mobile drug index of Bangladesh.

Full description:

Key Features & Benefits

1. Drugs details (Indications, Dosage & administrations, Contraindications, Side effects, Precautions & warnings, FDA pregnancy category, Therapeutic class,  Pack size & price).
2. Search Drugs (Search by Brand name, Generic name or Condition).
3. Drugs by Brands ( A-Z brands).
4. Drugs by Generic ( A-Z generic).
5. Drugs by Classes.
6. Drug by Condition.
7. Favourite Drugs (Bookmark brand name).
8. Medical events (information of international medical events).

On the drug name the drugs are synchronized by strength, forms, generic name, price & company name. Also we use specific forms icon for easy recognition. The app also provides thorough information about particular drugs such as: indications, dosage& administrations, contraindications, side effects, precautions & warnings, FDA pregnancy category, pack size &price. 

DIMS (Drug Information Management System) is the premier mobile drug index apps of Bangladesh. It is owned and operated by "TWgBD (Telemedicine working group of Bangladesh)". DIMS is the most comprehensive, advanced and up-to-date information source on available and recent drug products to serve the healthcare & pharmaceutical professionals in the country.


Disclaimers

DIMS is an mobile drug index apps, to be used only as a reference aid and educational purpose and is not intended for medical advice, diagnosis or treatment; neither intended to be a substitute for the exercise of professional judgment and should not be relied upon solely for final treatment decisions.
The clinical information contained in the information is intended as a supplement to, and not a substitute for, the knowledge, expertise, skill, and judgment of physicians, pharmacists, nurses, or other healthcare professionals involved in patient care.
We used reliable & authentic data sources and company literatures. Discover one of the top pregnancy tracker apps designed specifically for women and expecting parents. This application will keep you calm throughout your pregnancy, providing daily insights into your baby's development and your own health. It will let you know what’s happening with you and your unborn baby—week after week—and offer guidance on how to handle new situations. Keep track of your weight, blood pressure, tummy growth, baby's first movements, and contractions with our advanced tracking tools. Save all your important data in a single, easy-to-share report for your doctor, ensuring your pregnancy progress is well-documented.

Eka Care is India’s leading connected healthcare platform, dedicated to building a better healthcare system in India. Trusted by over 15 million Indians, Eka Care offers a one-stop solution for all your family’s health needs by providing a seamless and secure healthcare experience. With Eka Care, you can:

1. Generate Ayushman Bharat ABHA or ABHA ID number
Become a part of the Ayushman Bharat Digital Health Mission (ABDM) by creating your ABHA (Ayushman Bharat Health Account) or Health ID number. Your ABHA number is the key to unlocking your digital health journey. Securely store, share, and access your health data linked with your ABHA, including medical reports, prescriptions, and diagnoses.

2. AI-Powered HealthBot
Instantly access medical information and guidance with our AI-powered HealthBot. Whether you have a health query, need clarity on symptoms, or want insights from your medical records, the HealthBot provides accurate, AI-driven assistance in real-time.

3. AI-Based Health Assessments
    Get personalized health insights with our AI-powered assessments:
   - Health Risk Assessments: Evaluate your risk of chronic conditions like diabetes, hypertension, and more based on your medical history.
   - Symptom-Led Assessments: Get accurate insights by entering symptoms like cough, fever, or headache and learn about possible conditions.


4. Heart Rate Monitor (HR Monitor)
Use the Eka Heart Rate Monitor to measure your heart rate with just your smartphone camera—no need for additional devices. Track your heart health over time with a history of your heart rate measurements, securely stored in the app.

5. Medical Records & PHRs
Eka Care is the most advanced app for managing Personal Health Records (PHRs). Create and maintain digital health profiles for yourself and your family, securely store medical records, prescriptions, and diagnostic reports, and easily share them with healthcare providers.

6. Vitals Monitor
Track your essential health metrics such as blood pressure, blood sugar levels, cholesterol, and more. Sync with devices like Health Connect and Google Fit, or manually enter data to maintain a complete view of your health.

7. Health Trackers
Stay on top of your health with specialized trackers for various health metrics, including:
- BMI Tracker: Calculate and monitor your Body Mass Index.
- Period Tracker: Accurately track menstrual cycles with predictive insights.
- Blood Pressure Tracker: Monitor and record your BP readings for better management.
- Glucose Tracker: Log and track your blood sugar levels over time.
- Medication Tracker: Set reminders and track your medication schedules for better adherence.
- Sleep Tracker: Monitor your sleep patterns and understand your sleep quality over time.


Embark on your digital health journey with Eka Care. Download the app today to access a comprehensive suite of powerful health features for you and your family. Secure, user-friendly, and trusted by millions—your all-in-one health management solution is just a tap away.

MedControl: Your Personal Health Assistant

Forgetting to take your medication or looking for total, private control of your health in a single app? MedControl is your personal health assistant and virtual pillbox, designed to simplify the management of your treatments, vital signs, lab tests, and much more.

Your Privacy is Our Priority

At MedControl, we understand the importance of your data. That's why your information is yours alone: we do not sell your personal data or share it with third parties. If you decide to delete your account, all your data is permanently erased.

Simplified Medication Management:

• Reliable Reminders: Create custom alarms for your medications, pills, or vitamins. Receive timely notifications so you never miss a dose.
• Precise Control: Define dosage, frequency, medication information, and add notes.
• Inventory Management: Keep track of your medicine stock and set up availability alerts so you don't run out. Save the pharmacies where you buy each medication.
• Detailed Medical History: Confirm each medication intake (updating stock) and automatically generate a log. Ideal for improving treatment adherence and sharing accurate information with your doctor.
• Medical Check-ups: Save your doctors' data. Organize and create reminders for your visits and medical check-ups.

Vital Signs Monitoring and Symptom Tracking:

• Digital Blood Pressure Diary: Easily record your blood pressure readings (systolic, diastolic, pulse). Visualize your progress with clear charts and export detailed reports for your doctor. Ideal for hypertension monitoring or preventive control.
• Detailed Symptom Log: Noticing something? Quickly log your symptoms: describe what you feel, its intensity, frequency, and the medication you've taken. Keep a useful symptom diary to understand your progress and communicate better with your doctor.

MedControl goes beyond medication, helping you monitor your overall well-being:

• Monitor Your Vital Signs: Easily record and visualize blood glucose, blood pressure, temperature, heart rate, weight (weight control), height and BMI, and oxygen saturation (SpO2). Analyze your progress with exportable charts and reports.
• Lab Test Tracking: Save your laboratory test results. Visualize parameter trends (by setting ranges), create custom parameters, and export your data (PDF/Excel).
• Medical File Library: Store important reports, test results, and documents. Organize them with tags and colors for quick access.
• Personal Notes: Jot down relevant observations, dates, or any important health-related data.

Important Notice:

MedControl is a support tool to help you manage your health information. It does not provide medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. It does not replace professional medical consultation. Data and charts should be interpreted by a qualified healthcare professional. The use of the app is the user's sole responsibility. If in any doubt, CONSULT A DOCTOR. The application developer is not liable for any loss or damage resulting from the use of the application. By using this app, you accept these terms.

Glucose Tracker helps to keep your blood sugar levels in your target range and help prevent or delay long-term, serious health problems. Staying in your target range can also help improve your energy and mood. 

Use the App to track your blood sugar:

- When you first wake up, before you eat or drink anything
- Before a meal
- Two hours after a meal
- At bedtime

These are typical blood sugar targets: 

- Before a meal: 80 to 130 mg/dL (4.4 - 7.2 mmol/L)
- Two hours after a meal: Less than 180 mg/dL (10.0 mmol/L)

Your blood sugar targets may be different depending on your age, any additional health problems you have, and other factors. Be sure to talk to your health care team about which targets are best for you.

Glycemic index table allow you to avoid unwanted foods

Use our App for glucose tracking and stay healthy!
